attributes.action: lloydstsb sell off to the Coop
attributes.additional_details:
The forced sell off of Lloydstsb high street branches should be stopped. We would be forced to change our bank to an organisation we did not choose to bank with and may well of changed from in the past.
This is wholely undemocratic and should be abandoned.
Lloydstsb have a large High Steet presents as a result of customer requirements and satisfaction.
